CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 过去的；以前的；以往的；从前的；昔日的；已经结束的；不复存在的；刚刚过去的；刚结束的；历史的；过去时的；过时的；先前的
过去；往事；经历；昔日；过去时；过去式；过往；往昔
超过；经过；越过；在…的更远处；晚于；多于；在…之后；不再能；超出；通过
经过；超过；（时间）过去；过；越过；经过；从一侧到另一侧；在…之后；向…之外

word_group.brief_definition: 去年；过去年度；过去这年
(人)过老而无用, (物)旧得不宜使用
行家；能手；前会长；前主席
活在过去的时代里；思想守旧；怀旧
因第一个到达终点线而获胜；以简单多数票当选的
纪念物；使人强烈怀旧的东西
不可救药的；无法挽回的

bilingual.source: Groups of people find out about the past.
bilingual.target: 一群人了解过去的事情。

bilingual.source: It's interesting to learn about the past.
bilingual.target: 学习过去的事情很有趣。

bilingual.source: Talking about a holiday journey in the past.
Because it's exciting to learn about the past.
bilingual.target: 因为学习过去的事情很有趣。

bilingual.source: Let's write about a famous person in the past!
bilingual.target: 让我们写一写过去的名人吧！

bilingual.source: What has Jimmy experienced over the past twenty years?
bilingual.target: 吉米在过去的二十年里经历了什么？

bilingual.source: We had a debate about women's lives now and in the past.
bilingual.target: 我们就妇女现在与过去的生活状况展开了一场辩论。
我们不应该为过去的错误后悔。
他希望能挽回过去的错误。

bilingual.source: He regrets some of his past decisions.
bilingual.target: 他对自己过去的一些决定感到后悔。

yingyinNormal.en: And when you said you wanted to leave the past in the past, I didn't know we were talking about your past.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当你说过去的事就让它过去的时候，我还不知道你在说你的过去。

yingyinNormal.en: I know you do. Yes, well, but I always say, let the past stay in the past. I always say that, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道您还记得。是啊，但我总说，过去的事就过去吧。我也总这么说。

yingyinNormal.en: None of us can use it because we've already been in the past. And if your past self sees your future self...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们没法使用它，因为我们本来就在过去。如果过去的你，看见将来的自己，那么……
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: So, this past year, I had to spoon-feed those words to myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在过去的一年中，我时刻提醒自己牢记这一点。

yingyinNormal.en: Why would you say that? We were having a conversation about past lovers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么要那样说我们？当时在聊过去的爱人。

yingyinNormal.en: Over the past 55 months our businesses have added 10.3 million new jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在过去的55个月里，我们的经济已经增加了1030万新的就业岗位。

yingyinNormal.en: Over the past 55 months our businesses have added 10.3 million new jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在过去的55个月里，我们的经济已经增加了1030万新的就业岗位。

yingyinNormal.en: Over the past 53 months our businesses have added nearly 10 million new jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在过去的53个月里我们的经济已经增加了将近1000万新的就业岗位。

yingyinNormal.en: Over the past 57 months our businesses have created nearly 11 million new jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在过去的57个月里，我们的经济已经创造了将近1100万新的就业岗位。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa is asleep. What was that, flying past the window? And what was that noise?
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇睡着了。从窗边飞过去的是什么？这又是什么声音？

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa is asleep. What was that, flying past the window? And what was that noise?
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇睡着了。从窗边飞过去的是什么？这又是什么声音？

yingyinNormal.en: All told, our businesses have created 10.9 million new jobs over the past 57 months.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总共加起来我们的经济已经在过去的57个月里创造了1090万新的就业岗位。

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks to the work we've all put in our economy has come a long way these past six years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多亏了我们所做的所有工作，我们的经济在过去的六年里有了长足的进展。

yingyinNormal.en: And Francis was very upset about that. But that was the past. Let's talk about the future.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗兰西斯对此很不高兴，可这都是过去的事了，我们还是放眼未来吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Over the past four and a half years our businesses have created more than 10 million new jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在过去的四年半里我们的经济已经创造了超过1000万新的就业岗位。

yingyinNormal.en: And painting is a thing of the past. I call this a snapshot. Shoot it again. I think I blinked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 画像是过去的事了，现在来看看拍照。再来一次吧，我觉得我刚才闭眼了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's real? Octa-who-what? Ahtohallan. It's a magical river said to hold all the answers about the past.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的存在？亚托什么玩意儿？亚托哈伦，那是一条魔法河流，据说那条河里有所有关于过去的答案。

yingyinNormal.en: You both realize, of course that in the past few hours, you have broken perhaps a dozen school rules. Yes, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们两位一定明白，在过去的这几个小时里，你们已违反了将近几十条校规。是，校长。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Mycroft, last time, when we were on the phone... No, no, no, no, stop. I detest conversation in the past tense.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦考夫，上次我们通电话时……别别，打住，我不喜欢聊过去的事。

yingyinNormal.en: And on Thursday, we learned that over the past six months, our economy has grown at its fastest pace since 2003.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在周四，我们了解到在过去的六个月里，我们的经济在以2003年以来最快的速度增长着。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Optimists point out that technological upheaval has benefited workers in the <highlight>past</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乐观主义者指出，过去的技术变革的确给工人带来了好处。

examination_example.sentence: Hawaiian culture is not a relic of the <highlight>past</highlight>; it is a living culture undergoing a renaissance today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 夏威夷文化并非历史的遗产；它是正在复兴的、有着生命力的文化。

examination_example.sentence: If you are surrounded by problems and cannot stop thinking about the <highlight>past</highlight>, try to focus on the present moment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你被问题包围而无法停止对过去的思考，尝试专注于此时此刻吧。

examination_example.sentence: The value of work is also driving folks to continue working <highlight>past</highlight> retirement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作的价值也促使人们在退休后继续工作。

examination_example.sentence: As a condition of receiving state approval for the sale, the company agreed to seek permission from state regulators to operate <highlight>past</highlight> 2012.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为获得国家批准交易的条件之一，该公司同意向国家监管机构申请在2012年之后继续运营。

examination_example.sentence: The Transportation Security Administration (TSA) found in a secret check that undercover investigators were able to sneak weapons <highlight>past</highlight> airport security nearly every time they tried.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国运输安全管理局(TSA)在一次秘密检查中发现，卧底调查人员几乎每次尝试都能把武器偷运通过机场安检。

sense_info_list.en: a part of a person's history that is considered to be shameful

examination_example.sentence: You may feel guilt over your <highlight>past</highlight>, but you are poisoning the present with the things and circumstances you cannot change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能对你的过去感到内疚，但你正在用你无法改变的事情和环境毒害你的现在。

word_usage.usage: past作形容词，表示“刚过去的；从前的”时，只用于名词之前，修饰该名词，如：past events 往事
past作名词，表示“过去；昔日”时，常用单数形式，前面加定冠词the，如：look back on the past 回首过去

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: of or relating to a time that has gone by

examination_example.sentence: The big exception is China, where spending has far surpassed other countries over the <highlight>past</highlight> decade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个大的例外是中国，在过去的十年里，中国的支出已经远远超过了其他国家。

examination_example.sentence: You spent three decades writing about the <highlight>past</highlight> and focusing on the 18th and 19th centuries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 您花了30年的时间写过去的事，专注于18世纪和19世纪。

examination_example.sentence: They're often emulating bad managers they've had in the <highlight>past</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们经常效仿过去遇到的糟糕的经理。

examination_example.sentence: Life <highlight>past</highlight> 40 is far from smooth sailing, but it's so much more than the reductive depictions we see in women's magazines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 40岁以后的生活远非一帆风顺，但它远比我们在女性杂志上看到的简化描写要丰富很多。

sense_info_list.en: in or to a position that is further than a particular point
a part of one's life in which they did unacceptable or dishonest things

word_usage.usage:
past表“过去, 往昔”时，为单数名词，其前须加定冠词。
示例：I used to go there often in the past.
我过去常去那里。

past表“过去的, 以前的”时，多用作定语。
示例：in past years
在过去的岁月

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: of or relating to a time that has gone by

examination_example.sentence: We originally had this suspicion back in 2016, puzzled by the fact that national statistics showed calorie consumption falling dramatically over <highlight>past</highlight> decades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们最初在2016年就有这种怀疑，因为国家统计数据显示过去几十年卡路里消耗量大幅下降，这让我们感到困惑。

examination_example.sentence: Last year, over half of teachers reported that more of their pupils experience mental health problems than in the <highlight>past</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年，超过一半的教师报告说，他们的学生比过去有更多的心理健康问题。

examination_example.sentence: And based on <highlight>past</highlight> experiences, it takes four to five years after economic recovery for unemployment to return to pre-crisis levels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据过去的经验，经济复苏后，失业率需要四到五年才能恢复到危机前的水平。

sense_info_list.en: in or to a position that is further than a particular point

examination_example.sentence: She finally led me <highlight>past</highlight> a row of books, to a corner of the library where she pulled an oversized book off the shelf.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，她带着我走过一排书，来到图书馆的一个角落，从书架上取下一本超大号的书。

word_usage.usage:
past表“过去, 往昔”时，为单数名词，其前须加定冠词。
示例：I used to go there often in the past.
我过去常去那里。

past表“过去的, 以前的”时，多用作定语。
示例：in past years
在过去的岁月

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: of or relating to a time that has gone by

examination_example.sentence: For the <highlight>past</highlight> two years, Gordon's students have been studying ways to kill bacteria in zero gravity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去的两年里，戈登的学生们一直在研究在零重力下杀死细菌的方法。

examination_example.sentence: They think tradition means old things from the <highlight>past</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认为传统意味着过去的旧事物。

examination_example.sentence: In fact, I haven't got much sleep this <highlight>past</highlight> week, and I feel really tired.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，在过去的一周我睡得很少，感觉很累。

examination_example.sentence: Trust is a learned behavior that we gain from <highlight>past</highlight> experiences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信任是我们从过去的经验中获得的一种习得行为。

examination_example.sentence: Actually I'm going to meet with Professor Smith at ten <highlight>past</highlight> two.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，我两点十分要和史密斯教授见面。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 去年；过去年度；过去这年

sense_info_list.en: of or relating to a time that has gone by

examination_example.sentence: It has collected the numbers for the <highlight>past</highlight> 16 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它收集了过去16年的数据。

examination_example.sentence: Meanwhile in Europe, crops in the northwest are suffering the driest weather in the <highlight>past</highlight> 80 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，在欧洲，西北地区的农作物正遭受着过去80年来最干旱的天气。

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>past</highlight> 70 years, China has experienced historic changes and made great achievements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 70年来，中国经历了历史性变革，取得了巨大成就。

sense_info_list.en: in or to a position that is further than a particular point

examination_example.sentence: I did another stupid thing: I decided to hurry <highlight>past</highlight> him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我又做了一件蠢事:我决定从他身边匆匆走过。

examination_example.sentence: The other riders sped <highlight>past</highlight> to the finish line, and Eddie heard a cheer go up for the winner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他骑手快速冲过终点线，埃迪听到了为获胜者欢呼的声音。

examination_example.sentence: On Bob and Jessie's way home, they'll walk <highlight>past</highlight> a rubbish bin near the bus stop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在鲍勃和杰西回家的路上，他们会路过公交车站附近的一个垃圾箱。

examination_example.sentence: It was half <highlight>past</highlight> five in the afternoon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 已经是下午五点半了。

examination_example.sentence: It's half <highlight>past</highlight> seven on Monday morning: time to get ready for school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 周一早上七点半：该准备上学了。

examination_example.sentence: Half <highlight>past</highlight> two.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两点半。

word_usage.usage:
past表“过去, 往昔”时，为单数名词，其前须加定冠词。
示例：I used to go there often in the past.
我过去常去那里。

past表“过去的, 以前的”时，多用作定语。
示例：in past years
在过去的岁月
